review_title: CHANGE YOUR MIND  - TO - CHANGE THE WORLD - JOIN THE RIGHTEOUS REBELS
job_title: Country Program Director in New Delhi
pros: This is one space where you could freely air your opinions, wear your THINKING HATS OUT LOUD! While many places restrictions - at AHF - you are encouraged to speak your mind and act in the best possible way - to make LIVES better! One joins as a WORKERS, steps up to a LEADER, and then becomes a CHANGE MAKER at AHF!
cons: At time s I feel we are enjoying a little TOO MUCH FREEDOM and stray from our GOALS and thus dilute the MISSION of the organization.

job_title: Prevention Program Assistant in New Delhi
pros: Good facility in health insurance and leave
cons: No chances for exposer visit in another country
